author: Staff Reporter
text:
Separate criminal defamation cases have been filed against TNCC president E.V.K.S. Elangovan and Vilavancode MLA S. Vijayatharini at the District Sessions Court here on Wednesday.

The cases were filed by A. Gnanasekaran, Public Prosecutor, on behalf of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

Mr. Gnanasekaran said that the speeches of Mr. Elangovan and Ms. Vijayatharini at a public meeting held at Karungal on July 29, 2015 were defamatory.

Hearing the urgent petition, the Principal Sessions and District Judge (in charge) John R.D. Santhosham issued directions to issue summons to Mr. Elangovan to appear in the Sessions court in person on April 4 and for Ms. Vijayatharini on April 11, Mr. Gnanasekaran said.
title: Defamation cases against TNCC chief, MLA
